body_html: @aselle @alrojo - But , 3 Tensor array has to be empty , at each start of firs loop ( tf.while loop for attention ) . Moreover , I tried initializing the 3 Tensor Arrays outside the loop , which results in UnboundLocalError: local variable 'sub_initial_' referenced before assignment , which makes sense from the Python Point of View . I have no idea , where the code is doing wrong from the logical aspect .
